title: Ep 467 Liberals are Descending into Madness on Immigration and the Budget
description:
In this episode I address liberal madness on immigration. http://hotair.com/archives/2017/05/24/denver-just-tried-thwart-ice-reducing-sentences-domestic-violence/   http://m.washingtontimes.com/news/2017/may/24/whistleblower-dhs-knowingly-let-ms-13-gang-members/   I also debunk a persistent liberal myth about the economics of government spending . https://www.cato.org/blog/paul-krugman-pump-priming-trumps-pump?utm_source=Cato+Institute+Emails&utm_campaign=77869edb8e-Cato_at_Liberty_RSS&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_395878584c-77869edb8e-143016961&goal=0_395878584c-77869edb8e-143016961&mc_cid=77869edb8e&mc_eid=3fd7404a34
